item.title: Removing or Adding 9 to Dial out on VeriFone VX510
item.description:
Using the following steps to add or remove a 9 when using the VeriFone VX510 to process credit cards.
Step-by-Step Instructions First go into Quick Setup (6 on pad) Password is 1 Alpha Alpha 66831 Select Phone Edit to add or remove 9 and then exit Done! Now run a couple tests to verify that is properly dialing out on your VeriFone VX510. Once done you don’t have to worry about it failing when dialing out any longer.
